arts.ttl: Luciano Acosta, Léo Chú rally Dallas to 2-1 victory over winless Sporting KC
arts.sum: Newcomers Luciano Acosta and Léo Chú scored two minutes apart in the first half and FC Dallas rallied to beat Sporting Kansas City 2-1 at Toyota Stadium on Saturday night. Acosta pulled Dallas (3-2-1) even in the 37th minute with an assist from Petar Musa and Chú scored in the 39th for the lead.
